name: Tomb of Absolution
description:
A knight enters a tomb seeking absolution, but may find more than he expected lurking within.
An entry for Dungeon Crawler Jam 2023.

Credits

Jammmz - Art, narrative design
JL Sound - Audio design, sound effects
Matt Kimball - Programming, systems design

Font by Mrmo Tarius. Additional art assets thanks to game-icons.net, DALL-E image generator. Additional sound effects thanks to freesound.org. Powered by Typescript and three.js. Some art and basic dungeon rendering and movement interaction reused from previous projects.
